name: Feature Extraction
title: Extract features from images
description: Extract shape and intensity features from images
author: Jayapriya Nagarajan (jayapriya.nagarajan@labshare.org)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: angleStart
inputs.description: Angle start degree to calculate feret diameter

inputs.name: angleStop
inputs.description: Angle end degree to calculate feret diameter

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: pixelDistance
inputs.description: Pixel distance to calculate the neighbors touching cells

inputs.name: segDir
inputs.description: Input image collection containing image segmentations

ui.title: Input value
ui.description: Angle start degree to calculate feret diameter

ui.title: Input value
ui.description: Angle end degree to calculate feret diameter

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Input value
ui.description: Pixel distance to calculate the neighbors touching cells

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection containing image segmentations
